trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bayamón
There were no other sightings in Bayamón on or around November 10th 2012
Summary: 7 friends and I saw like 8 orange circles changing direction constantly and they emmited a light that was blinking.
divs: Sighting DetailsYesterday ;November 10,2012, I was at an activity celebrating one of my best friends birthday.There where about 25 people at first,but when they left there was only like 7-10 more people.We were sitting on the sidewalk talking and one of the guys tells us to look at the sky;there where at first three bleaming lights that where orange.They were not going fast but they where all changing direction .While we where watching the three UFO's we noticed like 4 or 5 more coming from the same direction.This sighting happened while we where in Bayamon,Puerto Rico.I am a believer in UFO's so I did not have a doubt it was not something earthlike.I really felt amazed watching this cause I was not the only one that saw it.I really appreciated that moment cause it was something really amazing and impresive.We lost sight of the objects when we where looking at the 4 or 5 UFO's coming from the same place that the first three came(when we saw those 4 or 5 we could still see the first 3) but we could only see them for about a little more than a minute because they where on a clear part of the sky,then the clouds made us loose them from our sight.I really appreciate you guys taking time for reading this and please look for information to see if it was or not something extraterrestial.Feel free to ask any more information.
